summary: Conflict Resolution Dashboard Frontend Testing - All 12 features verified and working correctly. Dashboard loads with metrics from /api/v3/conflicts/metrics, all metric cards display correctly, charts show severity/type breakdown, period selector works (7/14/30/90 days), navigation from Alerts page works via Resolution Dashboard button.
passed_tests: Total Conflicts card shows count (6) with resolved (0) and open (6) badges
Avg Resolution Time card shows N/A when no resolved conflicts
Conflicts by Severity chart shows MEDIUM breakdown (6 total, 0 resolved)
Conflicts by Type chart shows Orphan Node breakdown (6, 100%)
Top Resolvers section shows empty state when no resolvers
Recurring Conflicts section shows recurring item (/blog, 2x recurred)
Recent Conflicts table shows 6 stored conflicts with all columns
Period selector (7/14/30/90 days) works and reloads data
Resolution Dashboard button on Alerts page navigates to /conflicts/dashboard
View All button in Recent Conflicts navigates to Alerts page
View Task buttons navigate to optimization detail page

chart_sections.severity_breakdown: ✓ MEDIUM severity shown with 6 total, 0 resolved

lists_and_tables.recent_conflicts_table: ✓ Shows 6 conflicts with Type, Severity, Status, Node, Network, Detected, Action columns

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: All metric cards have proper data-testid attributes for testing
GOOD: Period selector uses React state to trigger data reload on change
GOOD: Empty states are properly handled (Top Resolvers, No Conflicts scenarios)
GOOD: Recurring conflicts section shows recurrence count badge
GOOD: Recent Conflicts table shows comprehensive data with View Task actions
GOOD: formatHours function handles N/A, minutes, hours, and days display
seed_data_creation: None - used existing 6 conflicts in seo_conflicts collection
context_for_next_testing_agent: Conflict Resolution Dashboard fully tested. Dashboard at /conflicts/dashboard shows: 6 total conflicts (all 'orphan' type, 'medium' severity, 'under_review' status), 0 resolved, 1 recurring (/blog). Top Resolvers empty since no conflicts resolved yet. Alerts page has Resolution Dashboard button. All View Task buttons link to corresponding optimization detail pages. Period selector (7/14/30/90 days) filters metrics data.
